title: Understanding Firewalls
text: A firewall acts as a barrier between a trusted network and an untrusted network, such as the internet.

title: Firewall Functions
text: Firewalls can block or allow traffic based on predefined security rules.

hintAnswer: monitor and control incoming and outgoing network traffic
title: Primary Function of a Firewall
text: What is the main role of a firewall in network security?
choices: monitor and control incoming and outgoing network traffic
